actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of the Frankfort National Fish Hatchery to the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Frankfort National Fish Hatchery in Franklin County, Kentucky, to the State of Kentucky.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of the Frankfort National Fish Hatchery to the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
